title: Medtronic earns FDA clearance for Stealth AXiS spinal surgery system
description:
Medtronic built the Stealth AXiS system to support a wide range of surgeon preferences, clinical complexity, and care settings.

The post Medtronic earns FDA clearance for Stealth AXiS spinal surgery system appeared first on The Robot Report.
